Bjorn.name: Bjorn
Bjorn.description: A mighty warrior from the north, known for his strength and courage in battle.

Lagertha.name: Lagertha
Lagertha.description: A legendary shieldmaiden and skilled warrior, respected by all who fight alongside her.

Harald.name: Harald
Harald.description: A fierce warrior with unmatched combat skills and tactical brilliance.

Olena.name: Olena
Olena.description: A master archer with deadly precision and unmatched accuracy in battle.

Artur.name: Artur
Artur.description: A skilled archer who commands the battlefield with his expert marksmanship.

Verdandi.name: Verdandi
Verdandi.description: A mystical archer with divine powers and supernatural abilities.

Gregory.name: Gregory
Gregory.description: A stalwart infantry commander known for his defensive tactics and leadership.

Yvette.name: Yvette
Yvette.description: A skilled pikeman warrior with exceptional combat abilities and strategic mind.

First Strike.name: First Strike
First Strike.description: Deals massive damage to the enemy with the first attack, often determining the outcome of battle.

Enrage.name: Enrage
Enrage.description: Increases attack power and rage generation, making the warrior more deadly in combat.

Divine Blessing.name: Divine Blessing
Divine Blessing.description: Provides healing and cleansing effects, protecting allies from harm.

Odins Asylum.name: Odin's Asylum
Odins Asylum.description: Grants immunity to control effects, allowing warriors to fight without interruption.

Counter Strike.name: Counter Strike
Counter Strike.description: Retaliates against enemy attacks with devastating counterattacks.

Shield Wall.name: Shield Wall
Shield Wall.description: Creates a protective barrier that absorbs incoming damage.
